message:
Implement bit manipulation instructions

Viua instruction set should include instructions for bit operations.
New instructions include:

- bits: creates a sequence of N bits
- bitand: bitwise and
- bitor: bitwise or
- bitnot: bitwise not
- bitxor
- shl: shift left
- shr shift right
- ashl: arithmetic shift left
- ashr: arithmetic shift right
- rol: rotate left
- ror: rotate right
- bitat: get bit N of bit sequence
- bitset: set bit N of bit sequence to 0 or 1
